titles.title: FORKS Made in America Permanency Act of 2025
Federal Ordinance Requiring Kitchenware Specifically Made in America Permanency Act of 2025
FORKS Made in America Permanency Act of 2025
To make permanent the inclusion of stainless steel flatware and dinnerware in the requirement of the Secretary of Defense to buy certain items from American sources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
